summary.message: clock skew detected on mon.ceph-02, mon.ceph-03
113145 slow ops, oldest one blocked for 28607 sec, mon.ceph-03 has slow ops

interval.name: interval
interval.desc: How frequently to reexamine health status

smtp_destination.name: smtp_destination
smtp_destination.desc: Email address to send alerts to

smtp_ssl.name: smtp_ssl
smtp_ssl.desc: Use SSL to connect to SMTP server

begin_time.name: begin_time
begin_time.desc: beginning time of day to automatically balance
begin_time.long_desc: This is a time of day in the format HHMM.

begin_weekday.name: begin_weekday
begin_weekday.desc: Restrict automatic balancing to this day of the week or later

crush_compat_max_iterations.name: crush_compat_max_iterations
crush_compat_max_iterations.desc: maximum number of iterations to attempt optimization

crush_compat_metrics.name: crush_compat_metrics
crush_compat_metrics.desc: metrics with which to calculate OSD utilization
crush_compat_metrics.long_desc: Value is a list of one or more of "pgs", "objects", or "bytes", and indicates which metrics to use to balance utilization.

crush_compat_step.name: crush_compat_step
crush_compat_step.long_desc: .99 is very aggressive, .01 is less aggressive

end_time.name: end_time
end_time.desc: ending time of day to automatically balance
end_time.long_desc: This is a time of day in the format HHMM.

end_weekday.name: end_weekday
end_weekday.desc: Restrict automatic balancing to days of the week earlier than this

min_score.name: min_score
min_score.desc: minimum score, below which no optimization is attempted

pool_ids.name: pool_ids
pool_ids.desc: pools which the automatic balancing will be limited to

sleep_interval.name: sleep_interval
sleep_interval.desc: how frequently to wake up and attempt optimization

update_pg_upmap_activity.name: update_pg_upmap_activity
update_pg_upmap_activity.desc: Updates pg_upmap activity stats to be used in `balancer status detail`

upmap_max_deviation.name: upmap_max_deviation
upmap_max_deviation.desc: deviation below which no optimization is attempted
upmap_max_deviation.long_desc: If the number of PGs are within this count then no optimization is attempted

upmap_max_optimizations.name: upmap_max_optimizations
upmap_max_optimizations.desc: maximum upmap optimizations to make per attempt

agent_down_multiplier.name: agent_down_multiplier
agent_down_multiplier.desc: Multiplied by agent refresh rate to calculate how long agent must not report before being marked down

agent_refresh_rate.name: agent_refresh_rate
agent_refresh_rate.desc: How often agent on each host will try to gather and send metadata

agent_starting_port.name: agent_starting_port
agent_starting_port.desc: First port agent will try to bind to (will also try up to next 1000 subsequent ports if blocked)

allow_ptrace.name: allow_ptrace
allow_ptrace.desc: allow SYS_PTRACE capability on ceph containers
allow_ptrace.long_desc: The SYS_PTRACE capability is needed to attach to a process with gdb or strace.  Enabling this options can allow debugging daemons that encounter problems at runtime.

autotune_interval.name: autotune_interval
autotune_interval.desc: how frequently to autotune daemon memory

autotune_memory_target_ratio.name: autotune_memory_target_ratio
autotune_memory_target_ratio.desc: ratio of total system memory to divide amongst autotuned daemons

cephadm_log_destination.name: cephadm_log_destination
cephadm_log_destination.desc: Destination for cephadm command's persistent logging

cgroups_split.name: cgroups_split
cgroups_split.desc: Pass --cgroups=split when cephadm creates containers (currently podman only)

config_checks_enabled.name: config_checks_enabled
config_checks_enabled.desc: Enable or disable the cephadm configuration analysis

config_dashboard.name: config_dashboard

container_image_base.name: container_image_base
container_image_base.desc: Container image name, without the tag

default_cephadm_command_timeout.name: default_cephadm_command_timeout
default_cephadm_command_timeout.desc: Default timeout applied to cephadm commands run directly on the host (in seconds)

default_registry.name: default_registry
default_registry.desc: Search-registry to which we should normalize unqualified image names. This is not the default registry

facts_cache_timeout.name: facts_cache_timeout
facts_cache_timeout.desc: seconds to cache host facts data

grafana_dashboards_path.desc: location of dashboards to include in grafana deployments

host_check_interval.name: host_check_interval
host_check_interval.desc: how frequently to perform a host check

inventory_list_all.name: inventory_list_all

manage_etc_ceph_ceph_conf_hosts.desc: PlacementSpec describing on which hosts to manage /etc/ceph/ceph.conf

max_count_per_host.name: max_count_per_host
max_count_per_host.desc: max number of daemons per service per host

max_osd_draining_count.desc: max number of osds that will be drained simultaneously when osds are removed

mode.desc: mode for remote execution of cephadm

oob_default_addr.name: oob_default_addr
oob_default_addr.desc: Default address for RedFish API (oob management).

prometheus_alerts_path.name: prometheus_alerts_path
prometheus_alerts_path.desc: location of alerts to include in prometheus deployments

registry_insecure.name: registry_insecure
registry_insecure.desc: Registry is to be considered insecure (no TLS available). Only for development purposes.

registry_password.name: registry_password
registry_password.desc: Custom repository password. Only used for logging into a registry.

registry_url.name: registry_url
registry_url.desc: Registry url for login purposes. This is not the default registry

registry_username.name: registry_username
registry_username.desc: Custom repository username. Only used for logging into a registry.

secure_monitoring_stack.name: secure_monitoring_stack
secure_monitoring_stack.desc: Enable TLS security for all the monitoring stack daemons

ssh_config_file.name: ssh_config_file
ssh_config_file.desc: customized SSH config file to connect to managed hosts

ssh_keepalive_count_max.name: ssh_keepalive_count_max
ssh_keepalive_count_max.desc: How many times ssh connections can fail liveness checks before the host is marked offline

ssh_keepalive_interval.name: ssh_keepalive_interval
ssh_keepalive_interval.desc: How often ssh connections are checked for liveness

use_agent.name: use_agent
use_agent.desc: Use cephadm agent on each host to gather and send metadata

use_repo_digest.name: use_repo_digest
use_repo_digest.desc: Automatically convert image tags to image digest. Make sure all daemons use the same image

warn_on_failed_host_check.name: warn_on_failed_host_check
warn_on_failed_host_check.desc: raise a health warning if the host check fails

warn_on_stray_daemons.name: warn_on_stray_daemons
warn_on_stray_daemons.desc: raise a health warning if daemons are detected that are not managed by cephadm

warn_on_stray_hosts.name: warn_on_stray_hosts
warn_on_stray_hosts.desc: raise a health warning if daemons are detected on a host that is not managed by cephadm

retain_interval.name: retain_interval
retain_interval.desc: how long to retain crashes before pruning them

warn_recent_interval.name: warn_recent_interval
warn_recent_interval.desc: time interval in which to warn about recent crashes

mark_out_threshold.name: mark_out_threshold
mark_out_threshold.desc: automatically mark OSD if it may fail before this long

pool_name.name: pool_name
pool_name.desc: name of pool in which to store device health metrics

retention_period.name: retention_period
retention_period.desc: how long to retain device health metrics

scrape_frequency.name: scrape_frequency
scrape_frequency.desc: how frequently to scrape device health metrics

self_heal.name: self_heal
self_heal.desc: preemptively heal cluster around devices that may fail

sleep_interval.name: sleep_interval
sleep_interval.desc: how frequently to wake up and check device health

warn_threshold.name: warn_threshold
warn_threshold.desc: raise health warning if OSD may fail before this long

batch_size.name: batch_size
batch_size.desc: How big batches of data points should be when sending to InfluxDB.

database.name: database
database.desc: InfluxDB database name. You will need to create this database and grant write privileges to the configured username or the username must have admin privileges to create it.

interval.name: interval
interval.desc: Time between reports to InfluxDB.  Default 30 seconds.

ssl.name: ssl
ssl.desc: Use https connection for InfluxDB server. Use "true" or "false".

threads.name: threads
threads.desc: How many worker threads should be spawned for sending data to InfluxDB.

verify_ssl.name: verify_ssl
verify_ssl.desc: Verify https cert for InfluxDB server. Use "true" or "false".

ceph_event_retention_days.name: ceph_event_retention_days
ceph_event_retention_days.desc: Days to hold ceph event information within local cache

config_check_secs.name: config_check_secs
config_check_secs.desc: interval (secs) to check for cluster configuration changes

failure_domain.name: failure_domain
failure_domain.desc: failure domain for any created local pool
failure_domain.long_desc: what failure domain we should separate data replicas across.

min_size.name: min_size
min_size.desc: default min_size for any created local pool
min_size.long_desc: value to set min_size to (unchanged from Ceph's default if this option is not set)

num_rep.name: num_rep
num_rep.desc: default replica count for any created local pool

pg_num.name: pg_num
pg_num.desc: default pg_num for any created local pool

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.desc: name prefix for any created local pool

subtree.name: subtree
subtree.desc: CRUSH level for which to create a local pool
subtree.long_desc: which CRUSH subtree type the module should create a pool for.

fail_fs.name: fail_fs
fail_fs.desc: Fail filesystem for rapid multi-rank mds upgrade

threshold.name: threshold
threshold.long_desc: The factor by which the `NEW PG_NUM` must vary from the current`PG_NUM` before being accepted. Cannot be less than 1.0

allow_pg_recovery_event.name: allow_pg_recovery_event
allow_pg_recovery_event.desc: allow the module to show pg recovery progress

max_completed_events.name: max_completed_events
max_completed_events.desc: number of past completed events to remember

sleep_interval.name: sleep_interval
sleep_interval.desc: how long the module is going to sleep

exclude_perf_counters.name: exclude_perf_counters
exclude_perf_counters.desc: Do not include perf-counters in the metrics output
exclude_perf_counters.long_desc: Gathering perf-counters from a single Prometheus exporter can degrade ceph-mgr performance, especially in large clusters. Instead, Ceph-exporter daemons are now used by default for perf-counter gathering. This should only be disabled when no ceph-exporters are deployed.

server_addr.name: server_addr
server_addr.desc: the IPv4 or IPv6 address on which the module listens for HTTP requests

server_port.name: server_port
server_port.desc: the port on which the module listens for HTTP requests

max_requests.name: max_requests
max_requests.desc: Maximum number of requests to keep in memory. When new request comes in, the oldest request will be removed if the number of requests exceeds the max request number. if un-finished request is removed, error message will be logged in the ceph-mgr log.

secondary_zone_period_retry_limit.name: secondary_zone_period_retry_limit
secondary_zone_period_retry_limit.desc: RGW module period update retry limit for secondary site

storage_class.name: storage_class
storage_class.desc: storage class name for LSO-discovered PVs

dump_on_update.name: dump_on_update
dump_on_update.desc: dump database to debug log on update

channel_crash.desc: Share metadata about Ceph daemon crashes (version, stack straces, etc)

channel_perf.desc: Share various performance metrics of a cluster

crush_compat_step.long_desc: .99 is very aggressive, .01 is less aggressive

end_time.name: end_time
end_time.desc: ending time of day to automatically balance
end_time.long_desc: This is a time of day in the format HHMM.

end_weekday.name: end_weekday
end_weekday.desc: Restrict automatic balancing to days of the week earlier than this

min_score.name: min_score
min_score.desc: minimum score, below which no optimization is attempted

pool_ids.name: pool_ids
pool_ids.desc: pools which the automatic balancing will be limited to

sleep_interval.name: sleep_interval
sleep_interval.desc: how frequently to wake up and attempt optimization

update_pg_upmap_activity.name: update_pg_upmap_activity
update_pg_upmap_activity.desc: Updates pg_upmap activity stats to be used in `balancer status detail`

upmap_max_deviation.name: upmap_max_deviation
upmap_max_deviation.desc: deviation below which no optimization is attempted
upmap_max_deviation.long_desc: If the number of PGs are within this count then no optimization is attempted

upmap_max_optimizations.name: upmap_max_optimizations
upmap_max_optimizations.desc: maximum upmap optimizations to make per attempt

agent_down_multiplier.name: agent_down_multiplier
agent_down_multiplier.desc: Multiplied by agent refresh rate to calculate how long agent must not report before being marked down

agent_refresh_rate.name: agent_refresh_rate
agent_refresh_rate.desc: How often agent on each host will try to gather and send metadata

agent_starting_port.name: agent_starting_port
agent_starting_port.desc: First port agent will try to bind to (will also try up to next 1000 subsequent ports if blocked)

allow_ptrace.name: allow_ptrace
allow_ptrace.desc: allow SYS_PTRACE capability on ceph containers
allow_ptrace.long_desc: The SYS_PTRACE capability is needed to attach to a process with gdb or strace.  Enabling this options can allow debugging daemons that encounter problems at runtime.

autotune_interval.name: autotune_interval
autotune_interval.desc: how frequently to autotune daemon memory

autotune_memory_target_ratio.name: autotune_memory_target_ratio
autotune_memory_target_ratio.desc: ratio of total system memory to divide amongst autotuned daemons

cephadm_log_destination.name: cephadm_log_destination
cephadm_log_destination.desc: Destination for cephadm command's persistent logging

cgroups_split.name: cgroups_split
cgroups_split.desc: Pass --cgroups=split when cephadm creates containers (currently podman only)

config_checks_enabled.name: config_checks_enabled
config_checks_enabled.desc: Enable or disable the cephadm configuration analysis

config_dashboard.name: config_dashboard
config_dashboard.desc: manage configs like API endpoints in Dashboard.

container_image_base.name: container_image_base
container_image_base.desc: Container image name, without the tag

default_cephadm_command_timeout.name: default_cephadm_command_timeout
default_cephadm_command_timeout.desc: Default timeout applied to cephadm commands run directly on the host (in seconds)

default_registry.name: default_registry
default_registry.desc: Search-registry to which we should normalize unqualified image names. This is not the default registry

facts_cache_timeout.name: facts_cache_timeout
facts_cache_timeout.desc: seconds to cache host facts data

grafana_dashboards_path.name: grafana_dashboards_path
grafana_dashboards_path.desc: location of dashboards to include in grafana deployments

host_check_interval.name: host_check_interval
host_check_interval.desc: how frequently to perform a host check

hw_monitoring.name: hw_monitoring
hw_monitoring.desc: Deploy hw monitoring daemon on every host.

inventory_list_all.name: inventory_list_all
inventory_list_all.desc: Whether ceph-volume inventory should report more devices (mostly mappers (LVs / mpaths), partitions...)

log_refresh_metadata.name: log_refresh_metadata
log_refresh_metadata.desc: Log all refresh metadata. Includes daemon, device, and host info collected regularly. Only has effect if logging at debug level

log_to_cluster.name: log_to_cluster
log_to_cluster.desc: log to the "cephadm" cluster log channel"

manage_etc_ceph_ceph_conf.name: manage_etc_ceph_ceph_conf
manage_etc_ceph_ceph_conf.desc: Manage and own /etc/ceph/ceph.conf on the hosts.

manage_etc_ceph_ceph_conf_hosts.name: manage_etc_ceph_ceph_conf_hosts
manage_etc_ceph_ceph_conf_hosts.desc: PlacementSpec describing on which hosts to manage /etc/ceph/ceph.conf

max_count_per_host.name: max_count_per_host
max_count_per_host.desc: max number of daemons per service per host

max_osd_draining_count.name: max_osd_draining_count
max_osd_draining_count.desc: max number of osds that will be drained simultaneously when osds are removed

mode.name: mode
mode.desc: mode for remote execution of cephadm

oob_default_addr.name: oob_default_addr
oob_default_addr.desc: Default address for RedFish API (oob management).

prometheus_alerts_path.name: prometheus_alerts_path
prometheus_alerts_path.desc: location of alerts to include in prometheus deployments

registry_insecure.name: registry_insecure
registry_insecure.desc: Registry is to be considered insecure (no TLS available). Only for development purposes.

registry_password.name: registry_password
registry_password.desc: Custom repository password. Only used for logging into a registry.

registry_url.name: registry_url
registry_url.desc: Registry url for login purposes. This is not the default registry

registry_username.name: registry_username
registry_username.desc: Custom repository username. Only used for logging into a registry.

secure_monitoring_stack.name: secure_monitoring_stack
secure_monitoring_stack.desc: Enable TLS security for all the monitoring stack daemons

ssh_config_file.name: ssh_config_file
ssh_config_file.desc: customized SSH config file to connect to managed hosts

ssh_keepalive_count_max.name: ssh_keepalive_count_max
ssh_keepalive_count_max.desc: How many times ssh connections can fail liveness checks before the host is marked offline

ssh_keepalive_interval.name: ssh_keepalive_interval
ssh_keepalive_interval.desc: How often ssh connections are checked for liveness

use_agent.name: use_agent
use_agent.desc: Use cephadm agent on each host to gather and send metadata

use_repo_digest.name: use_repo_digest
use_repo_digest.desc: Automatically convert image tags to image digest. Make sure all daemons use the same image

warn_on_failed_host_check.name: warn_on_failed_host_check
warn_on_failed_host_check.desc: raise a health warning if the host check fails

warn_on_stray_daemons.name: warn_on_stray_daemons
warn_on_stray_daemons.desc: raise a health warning if daemons are detected that are not managed by cephadm

warn_on_stray_hosts.name: warn_on_stray_hosts
warn_on_stray_hosts.desc: raise a health warning if daemons are detected on a host that is not managed by cephadm

retain_interval.name: retain_interval
retain_interval.desc: how long to retain crashes before pruning them

warn_recent_interval.name: warn_recent_interval
warn_recent_interval.desc: time interval in which to warn about recent crashes

mark_out_threshold.name: mark_out_threshold
mark_out_threshold.desc: automatically mark OSD if it may fail before this long

pool_name.name: pool_name
pool_name.desc: name of pool in which to store device health metrics

retention_period.name: retention_period
retention_period.desc: how long to retain device health metrics

scrape_frequency.name: scrape_frequency
scrape_frequency.desc: how frequently to scrape device health metrics

self_heal.name: self_heal
self_heal.desc: preemptively heal cluster around devices that may fail

sleep_interval.name: sleep_interval
sleep_interval.desc: how frequently to wake up and check device health

warn_threshold.name: warn_threshold
warn_threshold.desc: raise health warning if OSD may fail before this long

batch_size.name: batch_size
batch_size.desc: How big batches of data points should be when sending to InfluxDB.

database.name: database
database.desc: InfluxDB database name. You will need to create this database and grant write privileges to the configured username or the username must have admin privileges to create it.

interval.name: interval
interval.desc: Time between reports to InfluxDB.  Default 30 seconds.

ssl.name: ssl
ssl.desc: Use https connection for InfluxDB server. Use "true" or "false".

threads.name: threads
threads.desc: How many worker threads should be spawned for sending data to InfluxDB.

verify_ssl.name: verify_ssl
verify_ssl.desc: Verify https cert for InfluxDB server. Use "true" or "false".

ceph_event_retention_days.name: ceph_event_retention_days
ceph_event_retention_days.desc: Days to hold ceph event information within local cache

config_check_secs.name: config_check_secs
config_check_secs.desc: interval (secs) to check for cluster configuration changes

failure_domain.name: failure_domain
failure_domain.desc: failure domain for any created local pool
failure_domain.long_desc: what failure domain we should separate data replicas across.

min_size.name: min_size
min_size.desc: default min_size for any created local pool
min_size.long_desc: value to set min_size to (unchanged from Ceph's default if this option is not set)

num_rep.name: num_rep
num_rep.desc: default replica count for any created local pool

pg_num.name: pg_num
pg_num.desc: default pg_num for any created local pool

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.desc: name prefix for any created local pool

subtree.name: subtree
subtree.desc: CRUSH level for which to create a local pool
subtree.long_desc: which CRUSH subtree type the module should create a pool for.

fail_fs.name: fail_fs
fail_fs.desc: Fail filesystem for rapid multi-rank mds upgrade

threshold.name: threshold
threshold.long_desc: The factor by which the `NEW PG_NUM` must vary from the current`PG_NUM` before being accepted. Cannot be less than 1.0

allow_pg_recovery_event.name: allow_pg_recovery_event
allow_pg_recovery_event.desc: allow the module to show pg recovery progress

max_completed_events.name: max_completed_events
max_completed_events.desc: number of past completed events to remember

sleep_interval.name: sleep_interval
sleep_interval.desc: how long the module is going to sleep

exclude_perf_counters.name: exclude_perf_counters
exclude_perf_counters.desc: Do not include perf-counters in the metrics output
exclude_perf_counters.long_desc: Gathering perf-counters from a single Prometheus exporter can degrade ceph-mgr performance, especially in large clusters. Instead, Ceph-exporter daemons are now used by default for perf-counter gathering. This should only be disabled when no ceph-exporters are deployed.

server_addr.name: server_addr
server_addr.desc: the IPv4 or IPv6 address on which the module listens for HTTP requests

server_port.name: server_port
server_port.desc: the port on which the module listens for HTTP requests

max_requests.name: max_requests
max_requests.desc: Maximum number of requests to keep in memory. When new request comes in, the oldest request will be removed if the number of requests exceeds the max request number. if un-finished request is removed, error message will be logged in the ceph-mgr log.

secondary_zone_period_retry_limit.name: secondary_zone_period_retry_limit
secondary_zone_period_retry_limit.desc: RGW module period update retry limit for secondary site

storage_class.name: storage_class
storage_class.desc: storage class name for LSO-discovered PVs

dump_on_update.name: dump_on_update
dump_on_update.desc: dump database to debug log on update

channel_crash.name: channel_crash
channel_crash.desc: Share metadata about Ceph daemon crashes (version, stack straces, etc)

channel_device.name: channel_device
channel_device.desc: Share device health metrics (e.g., SMART data, minus potentially identifying info like serial numbers)

channel_ident.name: channel_ident
channel_ident.desc: Share a user-provided description and/or contact email for the cluster

channel_perf.name: channel_perf
channel_perf.desc: Share various performance metrics of a cluster

snapshot_clone_delay.name: snapshot_clone_delay
snapshot_clone_delay.desc: Delay clone begin operation by snapshot_clone_delay seconds

snapshot_clone_no_wait.name: snapshot_clone_no_wait
snapshot_clone_no_wait.desc: Reject subvolume clone request when cloner threads are busy
